oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Special Order detailing pickets of the 32nd Tenn. Inf. Regt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Special Order details pickets of the 32nd Tenn. Inf. Regt, CSA to be in reserve for the Officer of the Day and signed by Colonel Palmer who was commanding the brigade. On the reverse of the order is what appears to be an accounting by company of the men in the regiment.
